content: Barack Obama was the US President for 8 years, from 2009 to 2017.
He was the 44th President of the United States, serving from 2009 to 2017.
Obama was re-elected for a second term in 2012, so he was President for a total of 8 years.
The Atlantic Ocean was first explored by the Norse explorer Leif Erikson around 1000 AD.
